00035 OpxImport::OpxImport(TreeLibraryController* controller, Scene* scene, wxString filename)
00036 {
00037         // assign librarycontroller
00038         m_libctrl = controller;
00039 
00040         // set Scene pointer
00041         m_camera = scene->getGLCamera3D();

00044         m_scene = scene;
00045

00070 void OpxImport::Load(wxZipInputStream& stream)
00071 {
00072         // wxZipEntry pointer
00073         wxZipEntry* entry;
00074 
00075         // iterator
00076         std::vector<wxZipEntry*>::iterator it;
00077 
00078         // get first entry
00079         entry = stream.GetNextEntry();
00080 
00081         // walk through all entrys and push them into vector
00082         while (entry)
00083         {
00084                 // push pointer to vector
00085                 m_vector.push_back(entry);
00086 
00087                 // get next Entry
00088                 entry = stream.GetNextEntry();
00089         }
00090 
00091         // walk through all vector-entrys, find *.xml
00092         for (it = m_vector.begin(); it != m_vector.end(); it++)
00093         {
00094                 // assign entry
00095                 entry = *it;
00096 
00097                 // search entryname matches "*.xml"
00098                 if (entry->GetName().Matches(wxT("*.xml")))
00099                 {
00100                         // openEntry
00101                         stream.OpenEntry(*entry);
00102 
00103                         // load xmlstream
00104                         loadXml(stream);
00105 
00106                         // entry found
00107                         continue;
00108                 }
00109         }
00110 
00111         // refresh
00112         m_scene->refreshTreeAndCanvas();
00113 }

00119 void OpxImport::loadXml(wxZipInputStream& stream)
00120 {
00121         // temporary attributes
00122         double x, y, z;
00123         bool isVisible;
00124 
00125         // xml node pointer

00139 
00140         // node to root
00141         node = xml.GetRoot();
00142 
00143         // node to assemblyInformation
00144         node = node->GetChildren();

00154

00163 
00164         // node to camera
00165         node = node->GetChildren();
00166 
00167         // node to type

00171         node = node->GetNext();

00177         value = prop->GetValue();

00183         tok.GetNextToken().ToDouble(&x);

00185         // get camera y-position

00227                 node = node->GetChildren();

00232                 // walk through all next nodes

00234                 {
00235                         if (node->GetName() == wxT("group"))
00236                         {
00237                                 // get visible
00238                                 prop = node->GetProperties();
00239 
00240                                 // get value of visible
00241                                 value = prop->GetValue();

00243                                 // check if visible or not
00244                                 if (value == wxT("true"))
00245                                 {
00246                                         // set true
00247                                         isVisible = true;
00248                                 }
00249                                 else
00250                                 {
00251                                         // set false
00252                                         isVisible = false;
00253                                 }

00256                                 prop = prop->GetNext();

00258                                 // get value of name
00259                                 value = prop->GetValue();

00265                                 newGroup->setType(IS_GROUP);

00360                                 float z = wxAtof(tok.GetNextToken());

00363                                 prop = prop->GetNext();

00366                                 value = prop->GetValue();

00369                                 tok.SetString(value, wxT(" "));

00372                                 float orientationX = wxAtof(tok.GetNextToken());

00390                                 Assembly* assembly = loadOax(stream, value);

00393                                 assembly->setVisible(isVisible);

00400

00402                                 assembly->setRho(orientationZ);

00404                                 // add part
00405                                 m_actual->addPart(assembly);
00406 
00407                                 // check if next exist
00408                                 if (node->GetNext() != NULL)
00409                                 {
00410                                         // exist, set node to next
00411                                         node = node->GetNext();
00412                                 }
00413                                 // if not exist
00414                                 else
00415                                 {
00416                                         // node to parent
00417                                         node = node->GetParent();
00418 
00419                                         // if parent is scene, break
00420                                         if (node->GetName() == wxT("scene"))
00421                                         {
00422                                                 // leave loop
00423                                                 break;
00424                                         }
00425 
00426                                         // set actual
00427                                         m_actual = m_actual->getParent();
00428 
00429                                         // while no next
00430                                         while (node->GetNext() == NULL)
00431                                         {
00432                                                 // set m_node to next
00433                                                 node = node->GetParent();
00434 
00435                                                 // set actual
00436                                                 m_actual = m_actual->getParent();
00437                                         }
00438 
00439                                         // get next node
00440                                         node = node->GetNext();
00441 
00442                                         // start loop from beginning
00443                                         continue;
00444                                 }
00445                         }
00446                 }
00447         }

00449 
00454 Assembly* OpxImport::loadOax(wxZipInputStream& stream, wxString reference)
00455 {
00456         // wxZipEntry pointer
00457         wxZipEntry* entry;
00458 
00459         // iterator
00460         std::vector<wxZipEntry*>::iterator it;
00461 
00462         // oax importer
00463         OaxImport import;
00464 
00465         // walk through all entrys
00466         for (it = m_vector.begin(); it != m_vector.end(); it++)
00467         {
00468                 // get actual entry
00469                 entry = *it;
00470 
00471                 // check if right entry
00472                 if (entry->GetName().AfterFirst('\\') == reference)
00473                 {
00474                         // open entry
00475                         stream.OpenEntry(*entry);
00476 
00477                         // wxMemoryOutputStream to cache oax
00478                         wxMemoryOutputStream outMem;
00479 
00480                         // copy data
00481                         stream.Read(outMem);
00482 
00483                         // wxMemoryInputStream
00484                         wxMemoryInputStream inMem(outMem);
00485 
00486                         // wxZipInputStream to read content
00487                         wxZipInputStream inZip(inMem);
00488 
00489                         // reset Stream
00490                         inMem.SeekI(0);
00491 
00492                         // load oax
00493                         import.Load(inZip);
00494 
00495                         // add oax to lib
00496                         import.getAssembly()->setHash(m_libctrl->addEntry(reference, inMem, m_filename.BeforeFirst('.')));
00497                 }
00498         }
00499 
00500         return import.getAssembly();
00501 }
